entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sarnia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:34 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 10.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 10.9°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Dewpoint: 5.7°C
Wind: SSW 30 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 near noon. High 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
